election_record.label: Massachusetts 1800 Governor

sub_unit.name: Truro
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Truro.

sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Louden.

sub_unit.note: William Heath received 1 vote as General Heath.
